text: Lukas Graham is a Danish pop band from Copenhagen. It was founded in 2011. The band released their debut studio album Lukas Graham through Copenhagen Records in 2012. The band is best known for their songs "Mama Said" and "7 Years". The current members are lead vocalist Lukas Forchhammer and drummer Mark Falgren. The former members are bassist Magnus Larsson and keyboardists Anders Kirk, Kasper Daugaard and Morten Ristorp. They have been nominated for three Grammy Awards in 2017. title: Lukas Graham
